content: Although my main focus is on backend, it's not that I cannot fulfill full-stack developer roles.
I highly enjoy programming and researching low level stuff that is connected to software performance or statistics and scratching my head while messing around with data from cryptocurrency exchanges.
Another great interest of mine is System Design, I'm curious how big systems that connect millions and even billions of people work under the hood.
I'm a passionate developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
Nowadays, you can find me on Linkedin.
(I rarely use social media, so I might not reply immediately).
You can always check out my work that I do at GitHub.
You can find my resume over here => resume.
Click on a section on the left to learn more about my work and past experiences.
You can also navigate through the sections using the arrow keys.
